epidatatools 0.1.0
  • Reference

summarize_groups: summarize distinct groups

summarize_groups.Rd

summarize_groups: summarize distinct groups

summarize_groups(.data, .groups, ...)

Arguments

...

one or two variables, for a one- or two-way cross-tabulation
data

a data frame
w

weight
col

column percentages in a two-way cross-tabulation
row

row percentages in a two-way cross-tabulation

Value

a tibble

Examples

groups <- c("cyl", "gear", "carb")
summarize_groups(mtcars, groups, median(mpg), mean(hp))

#> # A tibble: 12 x 4
#>    name  value `median(mpg)` `mean(hp)`
#>    <chr> <dbl>         <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1 cyl       4          26         82.6
#>  2 cyl       6          19.7      122. 
#>  3 cyl       8          15.2      209. 
#>  4 gear      3          15.5      176. 
#>  5 gear      4          22.8       89.5
#>  6 gear      5          19.7      196. 
#>  7 carb      1          22.8       86  
#>  8 carb      2          22.1      117. 
#>  9 carb      3          16.4      180  
#> 10 carb      4          15.2      187  
#> 11 carb      6          19.7      175  
#> 12 carb      8          15        335
